name: Higher-Order Statistics
description: Analyzes kurtosis and skewness of gradient distributions. Natural images have heavy-tailed distributions while AI images tend toward Gaussian.
algorithm: Gradient Domain Kurtosis and Skewness Analysis
mechanism: Computes first-order gradient differences and analyzes their higher-order statistical moments. AI images show more Gaussian-like distributions.
useCase: Detecting Gaussian-like gradient statistics in AI-generated images
